version_description: The optimal remote for your Smart TV will be released on November 2nd. Pre-order it now with no strings attached. We're finalizing this app and working hard to deliver the best Smart TV Remote App possible.

Our app is now available! This is our first version and we will be working to improve it to offer you new features in the next week by:
- Adding the keyboard feature.
- Adding the screen mirroring feature.
We've fixed a minor bug regarding connection and improved our connection screen by making it more user-friendly. Thank you for your patience while we improve our app.

We're still doing our best and optimizing the app to meet your expectations. In this version, we:
- Added TV Settings buttons for Samsung Smart TVs.

Thanks for all the positive feedback! In this version, we added:
- A quick tutorial for the connection screen.
- Optimized cast speed.

Thanks for your feedback! In this version, we:
- Updated the connection flow.
- Fixed a minor bug for LG Casting.
In this version, we made some minor design changes and remote connection optimizations. Happy holidays!

Connect in just a few taps. Enjoy a lag-free experience. Never lose your remote again. Explore all controls from traditional remotes and much more. No clunky mechanics, just smoothe remote control action.

In this version, we have:
- Implemented some code for an upcoming UI refresh.
- Fixed minor bugs to improve overall UX.
In this version, we fixed a bug where the UI would not load for certain users transitioning from the previous version. We apologize for this inconvenience and thank you for your patience!
Control speed optimizations and minor bug fixes.
We're regularly updating our app to fix minor bugs and ensure a smooth experience across devices and iOS versions.
